title: Need help T.T
body:
I wasn't able to update league for the newest patch and i deleted it to re-install but now it doesn't let me even install it....
is it just me ?
by the way im using mac....

replies.body: Hey there, been seeing a few reports on this!  We've found that updating your OS version should fix this up.  We're also collecting more data if you'd like attach some logs via [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
Same. Everyone with macs are experiencing this issue, so far no word of it being fixed.

Thank You so much for letting me know Daddy 
i was going crazy

> [{quoted}](name=NeNewKs,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RZikMc4O,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-07T19:35:03.898+0000)
>
> Thank You so much for letting me know Daddy 
> i was going crazy

did you fix it though

no, it doesn't open, it downloads and installs but wont let me play it. 
i trying download on the safari, but the page cant be found so im downloading it on the crome but wont let me open to play

> [{quoted}](name=MrPuffDaddy99,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RZikMc4O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-07T19:31:28.533+0000)
>
> Same. Everyone with macs are experiencing this issue, so far no word of it being fixed.

how about now? did they do anything?
